CloudApp Developer

  • Login

Usage

You can use the CloudApp API to register an account, list your items, upload a file – anything Cloud.app or the web app can do.

Authentication

HTTP Digest is used to authenticate all requests.

JSON

You’re probably interested in JSON responses and not HTML. Add the header Accept: application/json on requests to receive JSON and Content-Type: application/json when you’re sending JSON.

Keep in mind usage of the CloudApp API is bound to our Terms Of Service.
